content: can be enabled by the client is the total physically installed memory minus the 160 GB of HSA memory.  A CPC drawer can have available unused memory, which can be ordered as a memory upgrade and enabled by LICCC concurrently without DIMM changes.  DIMM changes require a disruptive power-on reset (POR) on IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ with a single CPC drawer. DIMM changes can be done concurrently on configurations with two CPC drawers using Enhanced Drawer Availability (EDA).
